columns.name: Own Home
columns.reason: Found hLOCATIONr1 (HOME - HIDDEN: LOCATIONS) → selected because it is a direct 0/1 flag corresponding to Assigned S9_1; other assignment variables also exist so alternatives were considered.

alternatives.reason: dLOCATIONr1 (At your home - Hidden: dLOCATION) is a secondary hidden binary that encodes location selection but appears to be a derived version.
hLOCATION1 is a numeric assignment where 1 = At your home; uses codes rather than binary flags so considered an alternative.
hLOCATION2 is another numeric assignment variable where 1 = At your home; included as an alternative assignment field.

uncertainties: Multiple variables encode the same assigned location: hLOCATIONr1 (binary), dLOCATIONr1 (binary), and hLOCATION1/hLOCATION2 (numeric codes). Confirm which is preferred for reporting.
Confirm whether hLOCATIONr1 corresponds to the specific left/right assignment intended by 'Assigned S9_1' in the banner.
